name: system-notification-task-closed
description: System default template for task closure notifications
templateBody:
{{#if (eq channel 'email')}}Hello {{recipientName}},

{{/if}}[{{publisherName}}] @{{thread.createdBy}} closed Task with Id: {{thread.task.id}} for Asset {{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}
Current Status: Closed{{#if (eq channel 'email')}}

Happy Exploring!
Thanks.{{/if}}
